monogr.title: The barren tree : A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse October 26. 1623. By Tho: Adams
monogr.author: Adams, Thomas

div.head: TO THE REVErend and learned, Doctor DONNE, Deane of St. Pauls, together with the Prebend-Residentiaries of the same Church, my very good Patrons.
div.p:
NOt out of any opinion of this Sermons worth, to which I dare not inuite your Iudicious eyes. Nor, any ambition to merit of my Patrons, whom I read stiled, Petty creators. But in humble acknowledgement
of your fauours, I present this small Rent of Thankefulnesse; the poore fruit of that tree, which growes on your owne ground, and hath not from the world any other sustenance. Vouchsafe, I beseech you, your Patronage to the child, who haue made the Father of it,

closer.signed: Your VVors. deuoted Homager THO: ADAMS.
